blogPost.excerpt: No More Facebook lists privacy-friendly alternatives to Facebook products. Replace FB completely or use it less by trying these alternatives. Suggest a privacy-friendly alternative to help people depend less on one company.
blogPost.body: No More Facebook lists privacy-friendly alternatives to Facebook products. Replace FB completely or use it less by trying these alternatives. Suggest a privacy-friendly alternative to help people depend less on one company.
blogPost.title: No More Facebook - Privacy-friendly alternatives to Facebook products ❤️
blogPost.author: Kai Oelfke

localize.description: Facebook不再列出Facebook产品的隐私友好型替代品。通过尝试这些替代方案，完全替换FB或减少使用它。建议一个隐私友好的替代方案，帮助人们减少对一家公司的依赖。
localize.tagline: facebook产品的隐私友好替代方案❤️

localize.description: Facebook不再列出Facebook產品的隱私友好型替代品。通過嘗試這些替代方案，完全替換FB或減少使用它。建議一個隱私友好的替代方案，幫助人們減少對一家公司的依賴。
localize.tagline: facebook產品的隱私友好替代方案❤️

previous.excerpt: Not everyone has fast internet. If your page loads very slowly, your users will have less time to browse your site and your bounce rate will increase. This causes you to lose your customers.
previous.title: Screpy 2.0 - All-In-One SEO and website analysis tool

localize.description: 并不是每个人都有快速的互联网。如果您的页面加载非常慢，您的用户浏览您的站点的时间将会减少，而您的跳出率将会增加。这会导致您失去客户。
localize.tagline: 一体式SEO和网站分析工具

localize.description: 並不是每個人都有快速的互聯網。如果您的頁面加載非常慢，您的用戶瀏覽您的站點的時間將會減少，而您的跳出率將會增加。這會導致您失去客戶。
localize.tagline: 一體式SEO和網站分析工具
